评论概述: Pretty but uncomfortably tight in the chest
评论详情: I really wanted to like this dress, so much so that I tried it on 4 different times over the 1 month return window, but I just couldn't get past how strange it fits in the chest. I ordered a Small which should have fit just fine based on the measurements, but it was so tight it became see-through when I put it on. For reference, I wear a 32B so this is rarely an issue for me. The worst part is that it's tightest at the upper hem/neckline, so after maybe 5 minutes of wearing it there was a red mark all the way across my chest from where it was digging into my skin. I might order it again in a Medium or even a Large, because the design is otherwise cute and the color is beautiful, but I'm worried the rest of the dress will be too big and hang off me at that point.
